task.title: Registering for an Event through the Shopping Cart
task.abstract: Single or Group Registration is accomplished both manually or through the Shopping Cart.

taskbody.prereq: Prerequisites:See and proceed through the first two steps.

step.cmd: Click the Shopping Cart button on the Sales Order Detail page.
Select the Event checkbox in the Filter Results sidebar. Search for the ticket type and add it to the Shopping Cart.
Select the Interview tab and complete the "Pre-Event Questionnaire." Click the Submit button.
Click the Sessions tab and select the checkbox associated with the schedue item to add it to the Shopping Cart.
Review the field values in the Price and Quantity tab and click the Save button to preserve any changes. Otherwise, click the Checkout button.
step.info: Administrators can select the Price Override checkbox to manually enter a value in the Sales Price field.

step.cmd: Select the correct payment gateway and complete the required payment information. Click the Pay button.

taskbody.result: A record is created in the ePayments and Receipts related lists on the Sales Order Detail page. The payment status is indicated in the Message field of the ePayments related list.
